locations.Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Back Left Ches:
(here(can_blast_or_smash) and
                (can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Bow)))
                or can_gdv
                or (adv_spirit_mq_lobby_eye and (can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Bow)))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Entrance Back Right Che:
has_bombchus or can_use(Bow) or can_use(Hookshot) or
                can_use(Slingshot) or can_use(Boomerang)

exits.Adult Spirit Temple:
can_use(Longshot) and
                (spirit_temple_shortcuts or
                    (has_bombchus or glitch_spirit_mq_ceiling_boulder_skip)
                    and
                    (can_use(Silver_Gauntlets) or
                        (glitch_spirit_mq_silver_block_skip and
                        can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_hover and
                        can_live_dmg(0.5,False,False))
                    )

                )

locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Hammer Switch Che:
at('Adult Spirit Temple', (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and Megaton_Hammer)
                or ((has_bombchus or logic_rusted_switches) and can_use(Megaton_Hammer))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Recovery Heart 1:
Slingshot or can_use(Boomerang)
                or (is_adult and can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Recovery Heart 2:
Slingshot or can_use(Boomerang)
                or (is_adult and can_live_dmg(0.25,True,True))

exits.Spirit Temple Shared:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 2) and
                (has_bombchus or at('Adult Spirit Temple', (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                    logic_rusted_switches and Megaton_Hammer))

exits.Child Spirit Beyond Metal Bridge:
(Spirit_Temple_MQ_Child_Gibdo_Room_Switch_Hit or can_mega or can_use(Hover_Boots)) and
                    (is_adult or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or can_use(Dins_Fire) or can_play(Suns_Song))

locations.Spirit Temple MQ Map Room Enemy Chest:
can_kill_stalfos and has_soul(Keese) and has_soul(Anubis) and can_use(Dins_Fire)
                or at('Child Spirit Lower Loop', has_soul(Keese) and has_soul(Anubis) and can_use(Dins_Fire)
                    and (can_use(Hookshot) or can_use(Hover_Boots) or can_mega))

exits.Adult Spirit Sunlight Room:
can_use(Fire_Arrows) or (logic_spirit_mq_lower_adult and can_use(Dins_Fire))
                or (glitch_spirit_mq_lower_adult_no_fire and can_use(Hookshot) and can_isg and can_gdv)

locations.Spirit Temple MQ Child Climb North Chest:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 6) and can_kill_beamos and
                has_soul(Like_Like) and has_soul(Baby_Dodongo)
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Compass Chest:
((can_use(Slingshot) or (can_gdv and can_isg and Sticks))
                    and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7)) or
                (can_use(Bow) or (can_gdv and can_isg)) or
                (Bow and Slingshot or (can_gdv and can_isg and Sticks))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Silver Block Hallway Ch:
can_use(Slingshot) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                here(has_fire_source or (can_gdv and can_isg) or
                   (logic_spirit_mq_frozen_eye and can_use(Bow) and can_play(Song_of_Time)))
locations.Spirit Temple Silver Gauntlets Chest:
has_soul(Iron_Knuckle) and
                (((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                        (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or is_adult)) or
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 4) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and (has_explosives or Nuts) and
                        has_soul(Floormaster) and (logic_lens_spirit_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth))))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Central Chamber Flying:
has_soul(Flying_Pot) and
                ((is_adult and (Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump)) or
                    can_play(Song_of_Time))
locations.Spirit Temple MQ Central Chamber Top Lef:
(is_child and Boomerang and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and (Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7)) or
                (is_adult and (can_use(Boomerang) or Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump)) or
                can_play(Song_of_Time) or
                (Boomerang and (Kokiri_Sword or Sticks) and (Hover_Boots or logic_spirit_lobby_jump))

exits.Desert Colossus Hands:
(is_adult and glitch_clipping) or
                (has_soul(Iron_Knuckle) and
                (((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                        (is_adult or Slingshot or Boomerang or Sticks or Kokiri_Sword or has_explosives or
                            Deku_Shield or Hylian_Shield) and
                        (can_play(Song_of_Time) or logic_spirit_mq_sun_block_sot or is_adult)) or
                    ((Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 4) and can_play(Song_of_Time) and (has_explosives or Nuts) and
                        has_soul(Floormaster) and (logic_lens_spirit_mq or can_use(Lens_of_Truth)) and is_adult)))

exits.Spirit Temple Symphony Room:
(Small_Key_Spirit_Temple, 7) and
                (
                    (Megaton_Hammer and
                can_play(Song_of_Time) and can_play(Eponas_Song) and can_play(Suns_Song) and
                can_play(Song_of_Storms) and can_play(Zeldas_Lullaby)
                    ) or
                    ((Fish or Bugs) and can_shield and glitch_spirit_mq_symphony_lullaby)
                )

exits.Twinrova Boss Room:
Boss_Key_Spirit_Temple
                or (glitch_spirit_bk_skip_groundclip and can_hover and can_take_damage)
                or at('Adult Spirit Temple',can_use(Hover_Boots) and can_shield and glitch_spirit_bk_skip_headclip)
